title: Deflategate — Or Ballghazi? — Throws Shade On The Week In Sports
teaser: The "deflategate" investigation is finally out, but where does it leave the Patriots? NPR's Scott Simon talks with Howard Bryant of ESPN about the Pats' legacy, and what might be next for Tom Brady.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
